Instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit (190 degrees Celsius).

Combine the apples, brown sugar, white sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a large bowl. Transfer the apple mixture to the pan. Roll out the remaining dough and place it over the apples. Seal the edges, cut slits in the top dough, and brush the crust with frothy egg white.
Bake in the oven preheated to 375 degrees F for about 50 minutes or until the top is golden brown.
